post.body: Glad the vist was ok- Ryan loved bowling too- he wants to go back for night bowling. It is a fun family activity.
@Sweetnote Wow...I have never heard or seen this cartoon. Pretty cool. Thanks for sharing. :-)
When are your parents leaving? Did you have a good visit with your mom?
isn't fun. At least my mom will be able to see the house though. :-)
in Jan. sometime, we will be doing good- but it is getting stressful, plus paying 2 mortgages w/o the other rental income
still a few weeks away from moving- plus he has to be out of town in the next few weeks- we are thinking if we can move in
HA, HA! I so wish, but NO- Moving around the holidays sucks- Joe ran into a few unexpected issues with the floor, so we are
I have no idea- if I had to guess I'd say from Charlie Brown X-mas?
land, it is remarkable there aren't more accidents.
Scary- My mom is coming in on Tues., but if you thing abt. it out of the hundreds and hundreds of flights that take off &
I received that book for my nephew today, and it is AWESOME!! He is going to love it. Thanks again!
Sounds relaxing. :-)
Thanks- he made it home fine. :-)
Hubby made it home, safe and sound. :-)
Silence is a nice sound at the end of the day, isn't it? Enjoy.
will do. :-)
@KoolRoomz @kandihenry Thanks- glad to find out I'm not the only one- they usually are pretty calm around bed time-not tonight.
I am having a glass of wine tonight for sure. :-)
I love toaster oven. My hubby hates it though- he always burns his toast in it.
Thanks- I plan to have fun. Enjoy your night in as well. :-) Happy New Year.
Thanks. I'm looking forward to it. :-)
ok- thanks. How about you?
Making my Christmas-to-do list- so much to get done in the next few days.
Cleaning up the house- my mom is coming for a visit on Tuesday.
Drinking a glass of wine, hoping hubby gets home OK.
Got a lot done this morning- phone calls and appt's. made I had been putting off. Even vacuumed.
I've decided it is time to get rid of all the baby gear (sniff, sniff): http://twurl.nl/40nowx
The wild boys are in bed, and I'm having that glass of wine. :-)
The boys are totally crazy tonight. I can't wait until they go to bed. Is that bad to say? :-)
R's 5th B-day party today- it was fun- I can't believe 5 years has gone by already.
Done moving for the day- now I'm making dinner, and finishing party stuff for R's 5th B-day party tomorrow.
Moving today in the cold weather- it's supposed to snow later. Hope we can get a lot done before then.
Home from work- figuring out what is for dinner.
Had a relaxing New Year's- going to work tomorrow.
Drinking some coffee- waking up slowly today. Had fun last night. Happy 2009 everyone!
Going out tonight for New Year's- the first time in 5 years! http://tinyurl.com/a2sno9
Getting ready to enjoy the last day of 2008- I am actually going out tonight! http://tinyurl.com/a2sno9
